cause.description:
In the United States, every 16 minutes someone takes their own life. By walking in the 2007 community walks you can help raise donations for the AFSP (American Foundation for Suicide Prevention) for vital research and education programs to prevent suicide and save lives, increase national awareness about depression and suicide, and assist survivors of suicide loss.
Whether or not you have personally lost a loved one to suicide you can participate. If you would like to learn more and sign up for a walk in your area please visit this site; http://www.outofthedarkness.org/
1. Help raise awareness about suicide prevention
2. fund vital research and education about suicide
3. walk in honor of a lost love one
cause.mission: help raise donations for the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention
cause.name: Out of the Darkness Walk for Suicide Prevention
